string.value: The Sacred Barrier of the Forest
#p2081003#, who lives in #m240000000#, says he/she saw a strange tree in the forest...

#p2081003# said that while roaming around Minar Forest, he saw that the trees that lead to Dragon's Forest have turned #bred#k. He doesn't think the other Hafrings know about this and asked me to go tell the Chief.
As #p2081003#'s requested, I went to see #p2081000# and told him that the trees at the entrance of Dragon's Forest had turned red.

Have you just returned from the forest? If so, then you must have noticed a tree that has turned red at the path to the Dragon Forest from the split road in the middle of the forest. I don't understand how that happened. It's like the tree has turned crimson red. I don't think other Hafrings have noticed this sudden change. Please relay this story to the Chief Tatamo.
The chief needs to know this...
You look like you have something to tell me. Take your time. Explain it to me slowly and in detail.
Please relay the story I told you on The Red Tree to the #bchief. Tatamo.#k
